titleStmt.title: A preservative against Socinianism shewing the direct and plain opposition between it and the religion revealed by God in the Holy Scriptures / by Jonath. Edwards ...
titleStmt.author: Edwards, Jonathan, 1629-1712.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed at the Theater for Henry Clements,

notesStmt.note: Each part has separate t.p. and was published separately.
Reproduction of original in British Library (pt. 1) and Bodleian Library (pts. 2-3).
Imperfect: pt. 4 published in 1703 is lacking on film.
